message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to be discussing the sale of this product with you. I believe it holds immense value, and after careful consideration, I'm offering it to you for $1,800,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I recognize your perspective on the price, I believe the product's true value warrants a higher figure. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,650,000.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,550,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you coming up in price.  It seems we are getting closer. To show I'm serious about closing this deal, I'm willing to accept $1,600,000.

I'm getting close to your price, Alice, but I'm still not ready to commit to $1,600,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,575,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and my budget.
